title: Exquisite Kundan Jhumka with Emerald Accent and Pearl Drop
materials: and Cultured Pearl. Hyderabadi Polish for a radiant sheen.
features: Classic three-tiered design: A floral Kundan stud with an emerald accent, followed by a filigree openwork crescent moon design, and culminating in a traditional Jhumka bell shape. Meticulously handcrafted Kundan setting, creating a dazzling sparkle. Pearl drop adds a touch of elegance and movement.
occasions: and even adding a touch of ethnic charm to modern outfits.
description: A timeless design that blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with contemporary elegance. The use of high-quality Kundan stones ensures a dazzling sparkle that catches the light beautifully. The emerald accent adds a pop of color and sophistication. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's natural luster. The pearl drop adds a delicate and feminine touch. This Jhumka is a true heirloom piece that can be cherished for generations.
